text: Preparing the herbs Wash the herbs. Allow them to dry. Chop the chives into small pieces.  Strip the leaves from the lemon thyme. Discard the stem. Making the dip Place the cream cheese, sour cream and minced onions into the mixing bowl. Stir to combine well. Add a handful or so of capers (to taste) and the chopped gherkins. Stir through. Add the chopped herbs. Stir to combine all ingredients well. Transfer the dip to the serving dish.  Serve. Serve the dip with crackers, raw vegetable pieces or small pieces of baguette.
